Address.label: Address
Address.value: 104 COLEMAN BOULEVARD, SAVANNAH, Georgia, 31408, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Citi Trends Inc is a retailer of urban fashion apparel and accessories in the United States. The company offers apparel, including fashion sportswear for men and women, as well as children, such as newborns, infants, toddlers, boys, and girls; accessories comprising handbags, jewelry, footwear, belts, intimate apparel, scrubs, and sleepwear; and functional and decorative home products, as well as beauty products, books, and toys.
